sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import Parser from 'html-react-parser' import ProgressBar from './ProgressBar' import AnswerOptions from './AnswerOptions' const Question = props => { const { question, incorrect_answers, correct_answer } = props.question const options = [...incorrect_answers, correct_answer] options.sort(() => 0.5 - Math.random()) return (

{props.category} Quiz | Question {props.number + 1}

{Parser(question)}

) } export default Question
